Alchemist's Stone

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 371
resist fire [fireres]: +5
resist cold [coldres]: +5
alchemy bonus [alch]: 50%

Requires 5E5F to forge (E1F1)

This stone allows the wearer to transmute base metals into gold, resulting in greatly enhanced gains from alchemical transmutation.
